betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oPatters are used to store crafting and processing recipes so that your AE2 network can autocraft!

Patterns are encoded in the pattern terminal (any type).

To perform a recipe, place a pattern into an interface. If this is set up correctly, you will be able to requiest automatic crafting of items from your crafting terminal!

If the interface is touching a molecular assembler, it will perform a crafting recipe.

If the interface is next to a machine (furnace, pulverizer, chest, etc) it will perform a processing recipe.
